attributes.action: To have the right to heat your home with log  burners.
attributes.additional_details: I wish to see the data on which his information is obtained from because I can't find any my self.
attributes.background:
Mr gove claims 38% of pollution is caused by log burners, but does not mention power stations, huge container ships, ferry's, lorrys, diesel trains, planes,.
The cost of gas & electricity is sky high so for some a log burner is a cost effective option.
We have a human right to heat our homes.
